name: Dark Sun 2: Wake of the Ravager
name_original: Dark Sun 2: Wake of the Ravager
description:
Wake of the Ravager, sequel to the mega-hit Shattered Lands, hurls you back to the scorching world of Athas. A sun blasted, wind-scraped wassteland, Athas is hom to multitudes of the most horrifically mutated creatures you'll ever encounter! No wonder then that the mighty Dragon of Ur Draxa and his powerful minion, the Lord Warrior, gaze longingly upon this savage paradise: It's the perfect setting for their vile plans! If you think things on Athas couldn't possibly get hotter, think again...

Unleash Your Imagination. Despite the enormity of Athas, exploration is a dream thanks to the intuitive point-and-click interface. Battle over 20 monstrosities. Choose from over 200 spells. Encounter psionics, finely-honed telepathic skills that add a new dimension to game play. Enjoy improved interaction with characters and NPCs. All in 50-100 hours of the finest AD&D role-playing!

Induldge Your Senses. Revel in the spectacular full-screen graphics and cinematics, bigger and beter than ever. Action is continuous - combat, conversation and exploration all take place on one screen for a seamless, suspenseful adventure. Digitized character voices and sound effects plus a sizzling musical score complete the sensory extravaganza - making Wake of the Ravager an unforgettable role-playing experience!
